info.brief_description: The girls of Sonic the Hedgehog find themselves in an "exposing" situation.
info.description:
Notice: Abandon all hope ye who enter here. I'm kinda done with this thing. I honestly haven't logged in for over a year and I'm surprised this thing still gets new content. The problem is, the stuff that is added is mainly of content I don't care for or incredibly low quality, but I've got another writing project I've been doing that's kept me from caring. Well that and the whole "not logging in" thing. Read at your own risk.

In this story, various girls from the Sonic the Hedgehog games find themselves in an interesting predicament... they have lost all their clothes and now need to get back home without being noticed.
Some ground rules:

Game characters only!
If a character finds something to cover up with, it must be lost within 2 chapters
Try to keep the embarrassment going for as long as possible
No sex, and keep fetish to a minimum
Try to be creative in how they lose their clothes
Nudity is defined as wearing nothing, not even shoes and gloves. Anything worn on the head can remain
No bathroom stuff, please.
Chapters with poor grammar will be edited, chapters that are above the rating will be deleted with extreme prejudice!
Don't let lists drone on
